fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Accuse someone of wrongdoing. Tonight, anyone who investigates them will see them as a random Storyteller role. Next night, anyone they investigate will appear to be a random Storyteller role. (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Automatically, one of your two closest alive neighbors appear to be random Storyteller roles. You may choose which, and switch the target at any time.
- If a member of the Town/good faction is hanged, the introduction becomes "*The protagonist stands in front of the royal judge, shackled and looked upon with disdain. In order to seize their belongings, the protagonist's closest ally accused them of crimes they did not commit. Stripped of their possessions, castigated and alone, the protaganist was exiled from the kingdom and left to fend for their own...*". When the story is completed with this introduction, the Betrayed Exile may choose one person to banish at any time, dealing them an Unstoppable attack immediately.
